title: Relates to the payment of restitution by registered and unregistered repair shops
summary: Establishes that if financial loss has been made and a registrant or unregistered repair shop fails to comply with an order to pay restitution, the commissioner shall, by order, increase the amount of the penalty assessed.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the payment of restitution by registered and unregistered repair shops
